short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Google Chrome extension that shows if a page being served up via a Varnish web accelerator is fresh or not.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a fork from https://github.com/deizel/varnish-inspector, so he deserves much of the credit. I've improved this to work with different flavors of Varnish (the original had a dependency on the order of headers). In particular, I've been testing this with Fastly, a CDN that uses Varnish under the hood.
